review_data.title: Salty Pizzas

review_data.title: Great quality pizzas and great service
review_data.content: We went with friends on August 1st..couldn't believe it was open on Swiss National Day. There were 8 of us and we had great nibbles to start with. All different pizzas came at the same time and were good quality with good toppings. Nice atmosphere....More

review_data.title: Good and easy
review_data.content: I went a couple of times for lunch. They can always prepare some vegan food for me. The garden is a very lovely place where to enjoy the meal (during the rare sunny days in Adliswil).
